text: The Shirin and Farhad tree in Taq Bostan The Shirin and Farhad TreeA Very Tall Platanus Tree Attributed to Sassanids and Shirin and Farhad Legend,in Persian, Young Journalists Club. or Rahmat tree () is a 700-year-old tree of the genus Platanus located in the historical area of Taq Bostan in Kermanshah, Iran. The tree is tall and wide.http://www.magiran.com/npview.asp?ID=1848224http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=8802070399 ==References== Category:Individual trees in Iran Category:Individual plane trees Category:Kermanshah
title: Rahmat tree
